dmca.title: FW: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3187837H] Stolen Content
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Galganov & Associates [mailto:admin@galganov.ca] 
Sent: Sunday, February 25, 2007 8:41 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Re: FW: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3187837H] Stolen Content

A statement that the Complaining Party has a good faith belief that use
of
the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the
copyright owner, its agent, or the law:
The images identified below are the exclusive property of Galganov &
Associates.  These images are being redistributed in breach of terms as
posted at http://wallpaperoriginals.com/copyright.html and NO
permissions
have been granted for redistribution of any Galganov & Associates
images.

Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed,
or
if multiple copyrighted works at a single online site are covered by a
single notification, a representative list of such works at that site:

Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing or to be

to

Information reasonably sufficient to permit the service provider to
contact the Complaining Party, such as an address, telephone number,
and,
if available, an electronic mail address at which the complaining party
may be contacted:
Communicate with us regarding this notice at:
   admin@galganov.ca
and/or
   Galganov & Associates
   320 Erie Ave
   Brantford ON  N3S 2H8
   CA

A statement that the information in the notification is accurate, and
under penalty of perjury, that the Complaining Party is authorized to
act
on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly
infringed:
All content in this document absolutely accurate and I, Mason Galganov,
have absolute right to act in these matters.

/Mason Galganov/

-- 
Galganov & Associates
Brantford ON Canada
   KIS.BIZ(r)
   WallpaperOriginals.com
CA: +1.519-752-5381
UK: 084 5868 7730
This e-mail is confidential and may be protected by legal privilege. If
you are not the intended recipient, you should not copy it, re-transmit
it, use it, nor disclose its contents, but rather should return it to
the
sender immediately; and delete any copies from your system. Thank you
for
your cooperation.
